text: Leptopetalum is a genus of flowering plants in the family Rubiaceae. The genus is widespread in tropical and subtropical Asia and the Pacific. ==Species== *Leptopetalum biflorum *Leptopetalum foetidum *Leptopetalum grayi *Leptopetalum kanehirae *Leptopetalum mexicanum *Leptopetalum pachyphyllum *Leptopetalum pteritum *Leptopetalum strigulosum ==References== Category:Rubiaceae genera Category:Spermacoceae
title: Leptopetalum
